contexts.context: ...Another part went to Italy, to Africa and <mark>wherever</mark> their feet carried them. However, the biggest...

...the revolutionists are not far from our lands. <mark>Wherever</mark> they go, they will unleash all of their wrath...
...years already, this evildoer has been following us <mark>wherever</mark> we go. Every false accusation, every defamation,...
...as far away as possible from all disputes. <mark>Wherever</mark> two nations fight, they shall not intervene if...
...of my evil heart on you. Now go <mark>wherever</mark> you want to. Your path leads you to death...
